name: Broccoli Cauliflower Casserole
author: MUSTANGSTEPH21
summary: Great broccoli cauliflower recipe that everyone will love! The croutons on top give it that crunchy flavor everyone will love.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Put broccoli and cauliflower in separate saucepans and pour enough water into the saucepans to cover the vegetables completely; bring each to a boil and cook until tender, 3 to 4 minutes
Drain each and mix in a 11x7-inch baking dish
Beat eggs in a bowl until creamy
Mix mayonnaise, onion, and 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese into the eggs; pour over the vegetables
Pour melted butter over the broccoli mixture and top with the remaining Cheddar cheese
Sprinkle croutons over the entire dish
Bake in preheated oven until browned and bubbling, about 40 minutes
